statements: SELECT * FROM ProjectProgress WHERE project_id = 1
SELECT project_name, progress_percentage FROM ProjectProgress WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT project_name, milestone FROM ProjectProgress WHERE progress_percentage < 50
SELECT * FROM ProjectProgress ORDER BY end_date DESC
SELECT project_name, progress_percentage FROM ProjectProgress WHERE milestone = 3
SELECT * FROM ProjectProgress WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, progress_percentage FROM ProjectProgress WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND milestone = 2;
SELECT project_name AS ProjectName, end_date AS Deadline FROM ProjectProgress WHERE progress_percentage > 50 ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, milestone FROM ProjectProgress WHERE end_date < '2022-06-30' AND progress_percentage < 100;
SELECT AVG(progress_percentage) AS AverageProgress FROM ProjectProgress WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM Projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Specifications WHERE spec_id = 3;
SELECT project_name, end_date, start_date FROM Projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, spec_name, spec_details FROM Projects INNER JOIN Specifications ON Projects.project_id = Specifications.project_id;
SELECT * FROM Projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM Projects WHERE end_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, spec_name, created_date FROM Projects JOIN Specifications ON Projects.project_id = Specifications.project_id;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(spec_id) AS number_of_specs FROM Projects JOIN Specifications ON Projects.project_id = Specifications.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT * FROM Projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE member_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT team_name, project_name FROM teams INNER JOIN projects ON teams.project_id = projects.project_id;
SELECT project_name, status FROM projects WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND start_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT team_name, project_name FROM teams INNER JOIN projects ON teams.project_id = projects.project_id;
SELECT member_name, member_email, team_name FROM team_members INNER JOIN teams ON team_members.team_id = teams.team_id;
SELECT project_name, team_name, member_name FROM projects JOIN teams ON projects.project_id = teams.project_id JOIN team_members ON teams.team_id = team_members.team_id;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, project_id FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'in progress';
SELECT member_name, member_role FROM team_members WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT spec_name, spec_description, spec_owner FROM technical_specs WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects;
SELECT task_name, task_status, project_name FROM tasks JOIN projects ON tasks.project_id = projects.project_id;
SELECT member_name, member_role, project_name FROM team_members JOIN projects ON team_members.project_id = projects.project_id;
SELECT spec_name, spec_description, spec_owner, project_name FROM technical_specs JOIN projects ON technical_specs.project_id = projects.project_id;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(task_id) AS total_tasks FROM projects LEFT JOIN tasks ON projects.project_id = tasks.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM Project ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT team_name, lead_engineer FROM Team WHERE lead_engineer IS NOT NULL;
SELECT task_name, status FROM Task WHERE status='In Progress';
SELECT engineer_name, email FROM Engineer WHERE team_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM Project WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT team_name, lead_engineer FROM Team WHERE team_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT task_name, status FROM Task WHERE team_id = '323e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY task_name DESC;
SELECT engineer_name, email FROM Engineer WHERE team_id = '423e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT specification_name, description FROM Specification WHERE project_id = '523e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
